model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]

No, I didn't get sunburned. I'm just feeling a bit embarrassed.

I also feel that it helps me improve my skills, and I learn something new every time I push myself to do better. ### Classmates B: I completely agree. And I remember how determined you were to fix your spaceship after it was damaged in that meteor shower. You never gave up, and eventually, you found a way to repair it. ### Classmates A: Yes, that was definitely a scary situation, but I knew I couldn't just give up and drift away into the vastness of space. It took a lot of perseverance, but I made it back. ### Classmates B: And that same determination has led you to be successful in your career too. You never settle for mediocrity, and it shows in the quality of your work. ### Classmates A: Thank you, B. It's always been a personal goal of mine to strive for excellence. I think it's important to take pride in your work and produce something that you can truly be proud of.' }
